name: Trello
title: A visual cheat-sheet for the 29 keyboard shortcuts found on Trello

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 29 keyboard shortcuts found on Trello

cards.title: General I
cards.body:
| Shortcut             | Action                     |
| -------------------- | -------------------------- |
| `Up/Down/Left/Right` | Navigate Cards             |
| `B`                  | Open Header Boards Menu    |
| `/`                  | Focus Search Box           |
| `C`                  | Archive Card               |
| `D`                  | Due Date                   |
| `E`                  | Quick Edit Mode            |
| `Esc`                | Close Menu/Cancel Editing  |
| `Ctrl` `Enter`       | Save Text                  |
| `Enter`              | Open Card                  |
| `F`                  | Open Card Filter Menu      |
| `L`                  | Label                      |
| `;`                  | Toggle Label Names         |
| `M`                  | Add/Remove Members         |
| `N`                  | Insert New Card            |
| `,/./</>`            | Move Card to Adjacent List |

cards.title: General II
cards.body:
| Shortcut    | Action                |
| ----------- | --------------------- |
| `Q`         | My Cards Filter       |
| `S`         | Watch                 |
| `Space`     | Assign Self           |
| `T`         | Edit Title            |
| `V`         | Vote                  |
| `W`         | Toggle Board Menu     |
| `X`         | Clear All Filters     |
| `?`         | Open Shortcuts Page   |
| `Shift` `2` | Autocomplete Members  |
| `Shift` `3` | Autocomplete Labels   |
| `Shift` `6` | Autocomplete Position |
| `Ctrl` `C`  | Copy Card             |
| `Ctrl` `V`  | Paste Card            |
| `Ctrl` `X`  | Move Card             |
